Headline: #4 Cottage Grove,  #X4 Cottage Grove Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/35th
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove,  X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily near Cottage Grove/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily near Cottage Grove/35th.

Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Indiana, 33rd Blvd., King Drive, 33rd Place, Rhodes, 35th and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets , due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/35th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/35th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/35th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/35th.

Eastbound  buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Indiana, 33rd Blvd, King Drive, 33rd Place, Rhodes and 35th including the normal route streets due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/35th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
